title: 10 including JVP former PS member arrested over May 9 violence
body_lines: Ten persons including JVP former PS member Lakshman Palliyaguru have been arrested in connection with the violence on May 9.
Police said the suspects were arrested over the violence that took place in Weeraketiya and Medamulana areas.
The suspects would be produced in the Walasmulla Magistrate's Court today.
